programme.title: The Circus: Inside the Biggest Story on Earth
programme.desc: Checking and Balancing. Mark Halperin talks with Sen. Patrick Leahy (D-Vt.) about Neil Gorsuch's Supreme Court nomination; Rep. Adam Schiff (D-Cal.) weighs in on President Trump's alleged ties to Russia; Joe Biden enters the fray surrounding the healthcare bill(n)

A writer renowned for debunking infamous paranormal events is confronted by a force that he cannot explain upon checking into room 1408 of the notoriously haunted Dolphin Hotel. Mike Enslin (John Cusack) is an author who specializes in horror, but who only believes in what he can see with his eyes and touch with his hands. Having constructed an entire career on his ability to dispel superstitious "haunted house" rumors, Mike is convinced that the afterlife is a manmade construct designed to offer false comfort to the weak minded. Mike's latest project is a book entitled "Ten Nights in Haunted Hotel Rooms," and it seems that in room 1408 of the Dolphin Hotel, this skeptical scribe may finally find proof of the supernatural. Implored by the hotel manager (Samuel L. Jackson) not to enter room 1408, Mike defiantly procures the key and prepares to dispel yet another spectral sham. Now, as is the case with many of life's most profound epiphanies, the writer who thought he knew it all is caught entirely off guard at the precise moment he least expected it. Subsequently faced with undeniable proof of an afterlife, Mike may have a best-seller on his hands if he can simply survive until sunrise. Mary McCormack and Jasmine Jessica Anthony co-star in director Mikael Håfström's (Derailed) adaptation of an original short story by horror icon Stephen King(n)

programme.desc: An underachieving young student from inner-city Los Angeles makes the grade as a national spelling-bee competitor(n)

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: Risk Management. Season 2 begins with Chuck facing scrutiny within his office and from the Attorney General. Meanwhile, Axe refortifies Axe Capital and weighs his options for retaliation; the fund wrestles with a precarious economic landscape that threatens the very existence of Axe Cap; Wendy entertains an offer from a rival hedge fund manager; and Lara intervenes in an emergency at her children's school(n)

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: Dead Cat Bounce. Axe publicly spars with a rival hedge fund manager and with the help of a talented intern initiates a new financial play to hurt the competition(n)

programme.title: Billions

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: The Oath. Chuck develops a new strategy when his case stalls; Wendy helps a tech billionaire assess a candidate for a special project; Axe considers pledging half his net worth to charity; Lara's business faces a rival; Axe and Chuck find themselves in a room together for the first time since their face-off(n)

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: Currency. Chuck, Connerty and Sacker rely on an anxious insider who is willing to wear a wire; Axe's numbers take a big hit, so he scouts ideas for a quick financial play with a huge payoff; Wendy rediscovers her passion for her former job at Axe Capital when she works with an old colleague; the realities of expanding Lara's business come between her and Axe(n)

Mary McCormack and Jasmine Jessica Anthony co-star in director Mikael Håfström's (Derailed) adaptation of an original short story by horror icon Stephen King(n)

programme.desc: Checking and Balancing. Mark Halperin talks with Sen. Patrick Leahy (D-Vt.) about Neil Gorsuch's Supreme Court nomination; Rep. Adam Schiff (D-Cal.) weighs in on President Trump's alleged ties to Russia; Joe Biden enters the fray surrounding the healthcare bill(n)

programme.desc: The Flag House. Dar plays his hand; Quinn revisits his past(n)

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: Risk Management. Season 2 begins with Chuck facing scrutiny within his office and from the Attorney General. Meanwhile, Axe refortifies Axe Capital and weighs his options for retaliation; the fund wrestles with a precarious economic landscape that threatens the very existence of Axe Cap; Wendy entertains an offer from a rival hedge fund manager; and Lara intervenes in an emergency at her children's school(n)

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: Dead Cat Bounce. Axe publicly spars with a rival hedge fund manager and with the help of a talented intern initiates a new financial play to hurt the competition(n)

programme.title: Billions

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: The Oath. Chuck develops a new strategy when his case stalls; Wendy helps a tech billionaire assess a candidate for a special project; Axe considers pledging half his net worth to charity; Lara's business faces a rival; Axe and Chuck find themselves in a room together for the first time since their face-off(n)

programme.title: Billions
programme.desc: Currency. Chuck, Connerty and Sacker rely on an anxious insider who is willing to wear a wire; Axe's numbers take a big hit, so he scouts ideas for a quick financial play with a huge payoff; Wendy rediscovers her passion for her former job at Axe Capital when she works with an old colleague; the realities of expanding Lara's business come between her and Axe(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Neill Blomkamp (District 9, Elysium) expands on his 2003 short film Tetra Val in this futuristic sci-fi saga written in collaboration with screenwriter Terri Tatchell (who previously worked with Blomkamp on the screenplay for District 9), centering on the story of a police robot named Chappie, who develops the ability to think and feel for himself. As people fight back against the mechanized police force, sinister forces seek to capture Chappie for their nefarious purposes(n)

programme.title: Gordo
programme.desc: A young father leaves his successful taco stand in Mexico to start his own restaurant in the U.S(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: Sci-fi musical set in the 1960s centers on teen who believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them. But a leak at a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare(n)

programme.title: Darkness Falls
programme.desc: Children have a very good reason to be afraid of the dark in this flashy horror story. Matilda Dixon was a genially eccentric woman who, in the 1850s, lived in a New England town known as Darkness Falls. Matilda was well known to the local children for her habit of paying them for teeth they'd lost, but when two youngsters mysteriously disappeared, Matilda was lynched by an angry mob wrongly convinced that she had murdered the kids. In the year 2002, former Darkness Falls resident Kyle Walsh (Chaney Kley) lives in Las Vegas and is still desperately afraid of the dark since a childhood run-in with the ghost of Matilda Dixon left him severely traumatized. While police and psychiatrists scoffed at Kyle's stories about Matilda's spirit, his childhood friend Caitlin (Emma Caulfield) is alarmed when her nine-year-old brother Michael (Lee Cormie) begins having nightmares very much like those which disturbed Kyle's rest for years. Like Kyle, Michael has little luck convincing most grown-ups that the white-robed specters he sees in the dark are real, so Caitlin asks Kyle to return to Darkness Falls to help get to the bottom of his story. Darkness Falls marked the directorial debut of filmmaker Jonathan Liebesman(n)

A writer renowned for debunking infamous paranormal events is confronted by a force that he cannot explain upon checking into room 1408 of the notoriously haunted Dolphin Hotel. Mike Enslin (John Cusack) is an author who specializes in horror, but who only believes in what he can see with his eyes and touch with his hands. Having constructed an entire career on his ability to dispel superstitious "haunted house" rumors, Mike is convinced that the afterlife is a manmade construct designed to offer false comfort to the weak minded. Mike's latest project is a book entitled "Ten Nights in Haunted Hotel Rooms," and it seems that in room 1408 of the Dolphin Hotel, this skeptical scribe may finally find proof of the supernatural. Implored by the hotel manager (Samuel L. Jackson) not to enter room 1408, Mike defiantly procures the key and prepares to dispel yet another spectral sham. Now, as is the case with many of life's most profound epiphanies, the writer who thought he knew it all is caught entirely off guard at the precise moment he least expected it. Subsequently faced with undeniable proof of an afterlife, Mike may have a best-seller on his hands if he can simply survive until sunrise. Mary McCormack and Jasmine Jessica Anthony co-star in director Mikael Håfström's (Derailed) adaptation of an original short story by horror icon Stephen King(n)

programme.desc: Genetically created polar bears run amok and terrorise everyone in sight after they are created by a company seeking to take advantage of global warming(n)

programme.desc: John Rhys-Davies stars in this thriller about a rookie cop who tries to hunt down an elusive serial killer known as "The Wolf."(n)

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A high-powered executive and her boyfriend go on a weekend camping trip in the Canadian wilderness. Unfortunately, the couple get lost during a hike, and end up being hunted by a vicious black bear in this terrifying thriller(n)

programme.title: The Wraith
programme.desc: Young Jamie is killed by a drag-racing gang led by Packard Walsh because he was caught romancing Keri, Packard's girlfriend. Suddenly a mysterious power creates Jake Kesey, a cool motor-biker who looks much like Jamie. Around the same time a black turbo racing car makes an appearance in the town. Packard's gang begin to suffer from a number of unfortunate "accidents"(n)

programme.title: The Bleeding
programme.desc: Left for dead by a gang of ruthless vampires who forced him to witness the slaughter of his own family, ex-Army Ranger Shawn Black (Michael Matthias) vows to put every last one of the vicious bloodsuckers back in the ground where they belong. Later, as Shawn tracks down the hive's magnetic leader Cain (Vinnie Jones) and his loyal servant Vanya (Kat Von D), he realizes this is one job he can't handle on his own. Fortunately for Shawn, Reverend Ray (Michael Madsen) is there to help him realize his true potential as a "slayer", one of the few remaining humans with the power to defeat the living dead. DMX and Armand Assante co-star(n)

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: Harrowing docudrama about a 1971 psychological experiment in which 24 male undergrads at Stanford were asked to role-play as guards and inmates in a mock prison setting(n)

programme.desc: A zany season of a girls' fast-pitch softball team is followed as parents go crazy for wins and the coach is torn between pulling out all the stops in search of victory or actually teaching his players about life and fair play(n)

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: A young woman falls for her comatose brother's favorite musician in this romance set among the indie-music set in Brooklyn(n)

programme.title: The Death of Superman Lives: What Happened?
programme.desc: A documentary look at why the planned 1998 film "Superman Lives" was scrapped. The superhero flick would have starred Nicolas Cage as the Man of Steel and been directed by Tim Burton(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: A paroled thief gets sucked into an audacious heist scheme to steal a Monet painting by replacing it with a perfect duplicate(n)

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: A fine cast cooks up funny performances in this hilarious urban comedy. When a basketball player (Storm P) signs a $30 million contract, he invites friends and family from the 'hood to a cookout at his estate. But the barbecue doesn't go as planned, as the rich sports star deals with gold diggers, agents, stuffy neighbors and a wacky security guard (writer-producer Queen Latifah). Tim Meadows, Danny Glover, Farrah Fawcett, Ja Rule(n)

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: A young woman falls for her comatose brother's favorite musician in this romance set among the indie-music set in Brooklyn(n)

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: The plans of five college friends headed for a fun-filled weekend get abruptly changed when they find a 7-year-old girl alone at an empty café and have no choice but to drive her home. Once there, the group's worst nightmares are realized(n)

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: Jared Paul and Andrew Mogel's comedy The D Train stars Jack Black as Dan, a man in charge of organizing his high-school reunion. In the hopes of getting people to turn out, Dan becomes obsessed with getting Oliver Lawless (James Marsden), a classmate who is the star of a national advertising campaign, to come to the bash. Dan hunts down Oliver in L.A. and uses whatever means he can think of to manipulate Oliver into coming to the event. However, Dan's drive for Oliver's approval causes trouble in his relationships with his family and friends. The D Train screened at the 2015 Sundance Film Festival(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Gods of Dangerous Financial Instruments. A black comedy about a big-moneymaking management consultant and his high-rolling, low-ethics team. In the premiere episode, they head to New York to concoct a plan for bankers trying to justify their annual bonuses amidst financial chaos(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Amsterdam. The owner of a major sports franchise in Arizona is going through a messy divorce, so the Pod flies to Phoenix to help him over the rough spots. Meanwhile, Jeannie hooks up with a former flame, but cools things when she discovers his ulterior motives; and back at home, Roscoe's penchant for cross-dressing continues to ruffle feathers at school(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Microphallus. Marty learns that MetroCapital is seriously interested in acquiring Galweather-Stearn; the Pod pop on out to Indiana to consult on a beverage-company account; and Clyde has doubts about Doug's encounter with a transvestite. At home, a confused Roscoe has feelings for both a girl and a boy(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Mini-Mogul. When his father heads out of town, Marty decides to take Roscoe on his business trip to San Francisco, but quality time between dad and son takes a backseat to Marty's days being monopolized by the teenage CEO of a software company. Meanwhile, recently engaged Jeannie picks up a musician in a coffeehouse(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Utah. Jeannie has to take charge of the Pod when the racist CEO of a motel chain has reservations about dealing with Marty. Meanwhile, Clyde hopes to hit it off with a lovely Mormon virgin; and when Monica finds she has some free time on her hands, she decides to spend it with Roscoe(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Our Descent Into Los Angeles. Martin Kihn's hit book, House of Lies: How Management Consultants Steal Your Watch and Then Tell You the Time, is brought to the small screen by Matthew Carnahan (Dirt). The high-stakes corporate world of percentages, profit margins and aggregate turnovers may not sound like a rib-tickling recipe (especially when in the grip of an economic recession) but House of Lies is all about conning the high-stakes corporate world(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Bareback Town. Marty is distracted by a challenge from April during a trip to Washington DC, while father Jeremiah receives some bad news(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Veritas. Marty and The Pod take part in the annual Galweather- Stearn recruiting event, passing on pearls of wisdom to the next generation of business sharks(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Ouroboros. Marty and the Pod's archrivals at Kinsley-Johnson put the consultants through the wringer. Later, Jeannie accidentally leaks her big secret to Marty; and Roscoe and April bond while Marty becomes privy to a secret that Jeremiah has been keeping(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Prologue and Aftermath. Jeannie gets the opportunity to make a big name for herself when she leads the Pod to her hometown, where they hope to resurrect a foundering church. Meanwhile, Marty and Monica meet for a mediation over custody of Roscoe(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Business. Marty makes an uneasy alliance with 'The Rainmaker', before dealing with the fallout from his split with April in the form of an upset Roscoe(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: The Mayan Apocalypse. Marty gets help from a surprise source as he deals with MetroCapital's takeover attempt in the Season 1 finale. Meanwhile, Jeannie comes to a decision about her future with Wes; and Roscoe makes a choice that will have a serious impact on his future(n)

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: A young homeless couple feed their drug addictions through theft, but their lifestyle comes crashing down when one of them is hospitalized(n)

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: Six psychos escape from an insane asylum and set their sights on innocent visitors to a Halloween attraction(n)

programme.desc: A suicidal man (Christian Svensson) whose wife left him and took their child wants to cancel the hit he purchased on himself. Morocco Omari. Directed by Steven Minor(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: A banished warrior and a reclusive wizard team up to defend the Celtic people from an invasion by the Saxons in this epic adventure(n)

programme.desc: A zany season of a girls' fast-pitch softball team is followed as parents go crazy for wins and the coach is torn between pulling out all the stops in search of victory or actually teaching his players about life and fair play(n)

programme.desc: A tech hotshot is hired to infiltrate and steal secrets from a massive corporation, but his actions don't go unseen. Thriller(n)

programme.desc: A hapless cubicle drone must defend himself against a new boss who's really a malevolent vampire, intent on populating the office with more of his kind(n)

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Desperate to gain the acceptance of his wealthier peers at a prep school, a working-class teen establishes a cocaine pipeline and becomes a drug dealer. This intense crime drama is based on true events that caused a national scandal in the mid-'80s(n)

programme.title: Godfrey: Regular Black
programme.desc: Comedian Godfrey delivers a stand-up routine in his hometown of Chicago(n)

programme.title: Meskada
programme.desc: Class and economics muddy the investigation of a homicide in this thriller from director Josh Sternfeld. When a child is found murdered in the small town of Hilliard, police detective Noah Cordin (Nick Stahl) is assigned to investigate the case. The victim's mother, Allison Connor (Laura Benanti), is a wealthy and well-connected member of the County Board of Commissioners, so Cordin is under pressure to find the killer as soon as possible, but working with rookie officer Leslie Spencer (Rachel Nichols), he isn't finding many substantial clues. One of the few pieces of evidence suggests the culprit may have been from the nearby town of Caswell. Cordin was born and raised in Caswell and knows its history well -- while Hilliard is a prosperous suburban community, Caswell is a working-class town fallen on hard times, and its survival is dependent on a proposed factory coming into town. As Cordin spends more and more time in Caswell, he becomes a target for the resentment the locals feel toward their wealthier neighbors, and a tense situation becomes potentially explosive when word begins to circulate that Connor may use her influence to keep the new employer out of Caswell unless someone comes forward to identity who killed her son. Meskada (named for the county that contains both Hilliard and Caswell) also stars Norman Reedus, Kellan Lutz, Jonathan Tucker, and Grace Gummer(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Stochasticity. In the Season 2 premiere, the aftermath of the sexual-harassment scandal leaves Marty and his Pod adjusting to a new corporate culture at Galweather Stearn, where the interim CEO entrusts consummate closer Marty with sealing a big deal. Later, a boozy night on the town leaves Jeannie reeling, while Marty's relationship with Roscoe is in need of some repair(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: When Dinosaurs Ruled the Planet. In Las Vegas to help reinvigorate an aging casino, Marty meets the firm's newest consultant, a woman who was his biggest rival in business school. Meanwhile, Clyde is seduced by the Vegas nightlife; and Jeannie discovers a passive-aggressive adversary in Galweather Stearn's interim CEO(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Man-date. Marty and Clyde woo a Las Vegas casino mogul who has a healthy distaste for consultants, while Jeannie has ulterior business motives when she invites Tamara to spend a day at the spa. Later, Monica and her personal vegan chef appear to get along like two peas in a pod(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Damonschildren.org. Matt Damon (as himself) hires the firm to find a charity to enhance his image, but Marty soon realizes he may have to dig deeper than expected in order to keep the actor as a client. Meanwhile, Jeannie finds time to spend with Roscoe; and Tessa grills Monica about their status(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.sub-title: Sincerity Is an Easy Disguise in This Business
programme.desc: Sincerity Is an Easy Disguise in This Business. Marty is reunited with his younger brother, before meeting political consultant Brynn. Guest starring Lisa Edelstein(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Family Values. Marty's plan to spend time with Roscoe conflicts with an executive retreat, while Doug sees his fellow Pod members in a different light after introducing them to his new girlfriend. Later, Tamara offers an intriguing revelation about her personal life, piquing Marty's interest(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: The Runner Stumbles. Marty uncovers evidence of a client's role in a banking cover-up and wrestles with how to handle the situation, while Jeannie's former boyfriend posts something alarming on the Web(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Wonders of the World. During a consultation with an adult-toy company, Jeannie meets an interesting suitor, while Doug comes up with a racy gift idea for his new girlfriend. Later, Marty's brother Malcolm drives a wedge between their father and Marty(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Liability. Doug and Clyde receive a reality check when they're summoned to a legal deposition. Plus, Marty's patience is tested by casino king Michael Carlson(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Exit Strategy. Marty brokers a deal with his troublesome brother, and Jeannie questions her future after being presented with a lucrative job opportunity(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Hostile Takeover. A mercurial Las Vegas casino czar ups the ante on a business deal with a frustrated Marty; and Clyde's club-owner friends look to him to expand their brand beyond Vegas. Meanwhile, Marty picks up some inside dirt on Tamara(n)

programme.title: House of Lies
programme.desc: Til Death Do Us Part. New & Exclusive. Til Death Do Us Part: Season two concludes and Marty learns that there is no such thing as friends in business when he severs his ties to Galweather Stearn(n)

programme.title: HIGH School
programme.desc: After breaking his school's zero-tolerance drug policy, a valedictorian and his stoner buddy steal the local dealer's stash and taint the entire school bake sale to make everyone guilty of the same crime in this rollicking comedy(n)

programme.title: Hannibal Rising
programme.desc: This gripping thriller takes a stroll down the psycho-path to discover what's eating the young Hannibal Lecter, and how the good doctor developed his appetite for eating his fellow man. Gaspard Ulliel more than ably fills Anthony Hopkins' shoes as the madman who would be Hannibal "The Cannibal." Gong Li, Dominic West, Rhys Ifans, Aaron Thomas, Kevin McKidd, Richard Brake, Helena Lia Tachovska. Directed by Peter Webber and written by Thomas Harris, who adapted his own novel(n)

programme.title: Jessabelle
programme.desc: A woman returns to her childhood home in Louisiana following a debilitating car accident, and explores the mysteries of her past while confronting a malevolent ghost(n)

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A skilled medieval warrior and his small clan fight back against an oppressive ruler in order to avenge the murder of their master(n)

programme.title: The Ex
programme.desc: Acclaimed music-video director Jesse Peretz made his third feature with this comedy starring Zach Braff and Jason Bateman. Tom (Braff) is an aspiring chef whose wife Sofia (Amanda Peet) has just quit her high-paying job to stay home with their new baby. When it becomes abundantly clear that they can no longer maintain their New York City lifestyle, the family picks up and moves to Sofia's hometown in Ohio, where Tom is hired to work at her father's ad agency. It is there that Tom meets Chip (Bateman), the agency's wheelchair-bound golden boy, who also happened to have a one-night stand with Sofia while the two were cheerleaders in high school. Suddenly, Tom finds himself sabotaged by Chip at every step as the nefarious paraplegic schemes to steal Sofia from him and destroy any chance he might have of success at the agency. Released briefly in 2006 under the title Fast Track, the film was retitled The Ex before receiving a wide release in the Spring of 2007(n)

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: After they've broken up, a married movie star couple still have to go out and promote the movie they made together while they were in love, even though they now hate each other. To keep the junket from falling apart when the print of their film doesn't show up, the film's publicist tries to divert attention by concocting the story of the couple's reunion, that everything's still hunky-dory between them... when in fact, the actor is actually in love with his wife's formerly fat assistant and the actress has found a new beau named Hector(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: In Cold Blood. After the assassination of his ambassador, King Henry VIII (Jonathan Rhys Meyers) hungers for war with France, but acquiesces and agrees with a peace plan proffered by Cardinal Wolsey (Sam Neill), who has ulterior motives involving the papacy(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: Simply Henry. Henry endangers his peace treaty with France by offering an alliance to Holy Roman Emperor Charles V of Spain; Henry has the final say with a political rival; Elizabeth gives birth to Henry's illegitimate son(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: Wolsey, Wolsey, Wolsey!. When Charles V of Spain, the nephew of Queen Katherine of Aragon, visits, Henry tries to hide his lack of affection for his royal wife; Henry meets the beautiful Anne Boleyn and becomes smitten with her(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: His Majesty, the King. As a reward for his denunciation of Martin Luther, the Pope christens Henry "Defender of the Faith," but a brush with death causes the king to seek a solution to his lack of an heir. Princess Margaret reluctantly marries the decrepit King of Portugal, but the union is short-lived; Henry's "desire" for Anne Boleyn intensifies(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: Arise, My Lord. The King is shocked when Emperor Charles backs out of their alliance, and he is forced to consider his other options for support in Europe. Meanwhile, Anne Boelyn refuses the King's offer to make her his mistress, intensifying his desire to make her his wife(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: True Love. As Wolsey struggles to have the Church grant him a divorce, King Henry's infatuation with Anne Boleyn continues to grow(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: Message to the Emperor. As the plague that is sweeping England threatens Anne's life, Henry anxiously awaits word from the Pope regarding his request for a divorce(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: Truth and Justice. Campeggio, legate to the Pope, comes to hear the King's request to divorce Katherine, and despite Wolsey's intimidating tactics, the Pope is not convinced. Wosely is getting short on friends, and in desperation, he begs Katherine to abdicate her marriage(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: Look to God First. Confounded by the Catholic church prevaricating over the annulment of his marriage to Catherine of Aragon, Henry turns against Cardinal Wolsey(n)

programme.title: The Tudors
programme.desc: The Death of Wolsey. Poor, alone, and stripped of his former title, Wolsey looks to Katherine for support - a treasonous act, in the eyes of the law. Meanwhile, Henry and Anne Boelyn have an intimate encounter, but she exerts her power over him at the last minute(n)

programme.title: Lincoln
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg helms his long-in-the-making biopic of Abraham Lincoln for DreamWorks and Touchstone Pictures. Daniel Day-Lewis portrays the former head of state in the Tony Kushner-penned adaptation of Doris Kearns Goodwin's book Team of Rivals, which chronicles the President's time in office between 1861 and 1865 as he dealt with personal demons and politics during the Civil War. Sally Field leads a co-starring cast that includes Tommy Lee Jones, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, and Academy Award nominee John Hawkes(n)

programme.title: Enemy at the Gates
programme.desc: Jean-Jacques Annaud's WWII thriller is set in war torn Stalingrad, where the Nazis are threatening to overrun the city. Nikita Khrushchev arrives to stiffen the defending troops resolve and decides they need a hero to rally the forces. He finds one in Vassily Zaitsev, a deadly sniper whose expertise soon has the Germans in turmoil. To take him down, and therefore end the Russian's morale-boosted defence, the Germans send in Major Konig, Zaitsev's equal as a sniper, and the war torn ruins of Stalingrad become a deadly hunting ground for the pair(n)

programme.title: Tale of Tales
programme.desc: In this adaptation of three 17th-century Italian fairy tales about troubled royals, a queen conceives a child by eating a monster's heart, a king grows obsessed with a pet flea and a ruler is bewitched by a woman with a beautiful singing voice(n)

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: After they've broken up, a married movie star couple still have to go out and promote the movie they made together while they were in love, even though they now hate each other. To keep the junket from falling apart when the print of their film doesn't show up, the film's publicist tries to divert attention by concocting the story of the couple's reunion, that everything's still hunky-dory between them... when in fact, the actor is actually in love with his wife's formerly fat assistant and the actress has found a new beau named Hector(n)

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: A young boy living in a small country town dreams of making it to the World Paper Plane Championships in Japan despite having no funds to get there and a disapproving father(n)

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: With Dennis Quaid and Billy Bob Thornton in the cast, this historical drama features magnificent war scenes as it reconstructs the revolution over the independence of Texas, in 1836 –before, during and after the construction of the Alamo (a fort built by Spanish missionaries to catechize the natives). Texans and Tejanos (born in Mexico), led by William Travis, Davy Crockett (Thornton) and Jim Bowie, are besieged by an army commanded by Mexican dictator Antonio Lopez de Santa Ana. Later, however, the outcome of the battle of San Jacinto, under General Sam Houston (Dennis Quaid), is the defeat of the Santa Ana men, which finally leads to the independence of the state(n)

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: A modern-day marine biologist (Josh Hartnett) slips into a coma, taking him on an epic journey through time while exploring his undying love for a woman that spanned four centuries. As he fights for his life on a hospital bed, his journey through the First Anglo-Maratha War becomes interwoven through passion and love(n)

programme.title: People Like Us
programme.desc: Businessman Sam returns home for his father's funeral, where he learns he has a sister named Frankie. As Sam connects with Frankie and puts his father's affairs in order, he is forced to reflect on his own life choices in this riveting comedy-drama(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote, directed, produced and costars in this gripping drama about a scandal that rocks two families with a lengthy history. One of them is upper-class, the other working class, and each is led by a strong-willed matriarch who are long-time friends. Kathy Bates and Alfre Woodard are outstanding as the two women trying to keep their respective families from ruining countless lives. The superb ensemble cast also features Sanaa Lathan, Cole Hauser, Rockmond Dunbar and Kadee Strickland(n)

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: Gritty drama starring Christian Bale as a man whose brother disappears when he gets mixed up with a violent crime ring(n)

programme.title: The Alamo
programme.desc: With Dennis Quaid and Billy Bob Thornton in the cast, this historical drama features magnificent war scenes as it reconstructs the revolution over the independence of Texas, in 1836 –before, during and after the construction of the Alamo (a fort built by Spanish missionaries to catechize the natives). Texans and Tejanos (born in Mexico), led by William Travis, Davy Crockett (Thornton) and Jim Bowie, are besieged by an army commanded by Mexican dictator Antonio Lopez de Santa Ana. Later, however, the outcome of the battle of San Jacinto, under General Sam Houston (Dennis Quaid), is the defeat of the Santa Ana men, which finally leads to the independence of the state(n)

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma
programme.desc: Remake of the 1950s western about a rancher who turns a notorious outlaw over to the authorities. In a bid to pay off his debts, the man agrees to join the team of men escorting the outlaw across country to the titular train, which will transport him to Yuma Prison. However, the rancher and his comrades soon find themselves pitted against the outlaw's band of vicious followers, who are desperate to rescue him(n)

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: Ex-soldiers Michael Atwood (Chiwetel Ejiofor) and Russel Welch (Norman Reedus) lead an Atlanta criminal organization, which also includes Welch's troubled brother Gabe (Aaron Paul) and dirty cops Marcus Belmont (Anthony Mackie) and Jorge Rodriguez (Clifton Collins Jr.). The five heisters are contracted by the Russian-Israeli mob, headed by matriarch Irina Vlaslov (Kate Winslet), to pull off a dangerous job, and they decide to create the diversion of an "officer down" call as a cover for the robbery. Marcus' straight-arrow new partner Chris (Casey Affleck) is soon targeted as the mark for the shooting; meanwhile, Chris' uncle, Detective Jeffrey Allen (Woody Harrelson), works to foil the criminals. John Hillcoat directed this ensemble /action thriller written by Matt Cook(n)

programme.title: Poltergeist III
programme.desc: The evil presence returns once again(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass 3: Bad Asses on the Bayou
programme.desc: Senior friends visit Louisiana for a wedding and become involved with kidnappers(n)

programme.title: The Final Cut
programme.desc: Robin Williams gives a powerful performance in this riveting sci-fi thriller about a world where memory implants record all the moments of a person's life. Williams plays a troubled "cutter" who edits together the footage for funerals. Omar Naim directed and wrote the script. Mira Sorvino, Jim Caviezel(n)

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: CIA man Brad Pitt faces death in a Chinese jail; veteran agent Robert Redford is his only shot at freedom(n)

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: Neill Blomkamp (District 9, Elysium) expands on his 2003 short film Tetra Val in this futuristic sci-fi saga written in collaboration with screenwriter Terri Tatchell (who previously worked with Blomkamp on the screenplay for District 9), centering on the story of a police robot named Chappie, who develops the ability to think and feel for himself. As people fight back against the mechanized police force, sinister forces seek to capture Chappie for their nefarious purposes(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone returns to the director's chair for Rocky Balboa, the fifth sequel to the film that made him a superstar 30 years before. The movie begins with Rocky (Stallone) still mourning the death of his loyal and beloved wife, Adrian, who died three years previously after losing a battle against cancer. Rocky owns an Italian restaurant and spends his days living in his working-class Philadelphia neighborhood, visiting with his customers, and telling stories about his past. Starring Sylvester Stallone(n)

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: In this historical drama set during the Cold War, an attorney is tasked with negotiating a prisoner exchange between an American pilot who was shot down over the USSR and a Soviet spy serving a 45-year sentence for espionage against the US(n)

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A disillusioned drone pilot, who controls spy aircrafts hovering over the Middle East from a trailer in Las Vegas, begins to feel morally disconnected from his military orders in this timely drama(n)

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: When London is overrun by zombies, one man has a plan: go to the pub and wait for it all to blow over(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Miami detectives Crockett and Tubbs go undercover to break up a Colombian drug cartel(n)

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous
programme.desc: Veteran assassin Joe begins to question his chosen occupation after falling for a deaf girl in the Thai capital(n)

programme.title: American Jihad
programme.desc: An examination of how young men are radicalized in the U.S. to commit terrorists acts and what can be done to prevent it(n)

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: Roger Donaldson's bank heist conspiracy-thriller - scripted by Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais - stars Jason Statham as the leader of a gang of thieves who bite off more than they can chew. When car dealer and one-time crook Terry Leather is approached by his old flame Martine Love with a proposition that would put his money worries behind him for good, he jumps at the chance. Leather quickly assembles a team which digs a tunnel directly into a London bank's vault. But what he hasn't been told is that, in addition to the money, he'll also be stealing a safety box containing material that, if it saw the light of day, would be extremely damaging to the royal family. Another box they take holds further dramatic revelations concerning establishment figures. So it's not long before Leather and the gang are pursued by the police, MI5 and various thugs, all keen to get their hands on the incendiary information..(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: When ordinary fish tank cleaner Deuce Bigalow (Rob Schneider) accidentally sets fire to a kitchen whilst house-sitting, he must go into business as a male prostitute to pay for the damage(n)

programme.title: A Murder in the Park
programme.desc: A stunning look at the pardon of former death-row inmate Anthony Porter, and subsequent arrest of another man, for a double murder committed in Chicago in the '80s. The filmmakers question whether Porter was in fact guilty of the crime(n)

programme.title: F/X
programme.desc: Offbeat conspiracy thriller in which a cinema special-effects wizard is hired to stage the phoney assassination of a mobster. Unfortunately, his stunt turns out to be just a little too lifelike, and he finds himself the target of hit men. Can his ingenuity save him from those who double-crossed him and want no loose ends left behind?(n)

programme.title: FX 2
programme.desc: Bryan Brown and Brian Dennehy team up once more using their special effects and investigation skills, to find those responsible for the death of a cop who knew too much(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Biopic of 1960s boxer Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, who was unjustly imprisoned for murder and served more than two decades before winning his freedom(n)

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: Calogero Anello is a streetwise nine-year old who lives in a small apartment under the strict guidance of his bus driver father Lorenzo. One day Calogero witnesses a murder committed by a local gangster boss, Sonny. After Calogero refuses to identify Sonny, the gangster takes the boy under his wing, gradually introducing him to a new way of life. Soon, Calogero finds himself torn between two fathers and two very different ways of life(n)

programme.title: Disgraced
programme.desc: An examination of the 2003 murder of Baylor University basketball player Patrick Dennehy by his friend Carlton Dotson, and the ensuing accusations aimed at the university and coach Dave Bliss(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Biopic of 1960s boxer Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, who was unjustly imprisoned for murder and served more than two decades before winning his freedom(n)

programme.title: Mr. Brooks
programme.desc: Earl Brooks is a man whose seemingly perfect family and status in the community hide an ugly secret. Brooks constantly says the plea of an addict--the Serenity Prayer--but he's not in the grip of drugs or alcohol. Instead, his neat little bow tie belies a man with an urge to kill(n)

programme.desc: A youngster is forced to go to live with his aunt on an isolated Canadian island following the death of his parents, and forms a bond with an orphaned wild pony - a relationship that helps him deal with his grief. Drama, starring Jane Seymour, Mark Rendall and James McGowan.(n)

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Two squabbling brothers with time on their hands decide to play a mysterious old board game after finding it in their basement. A chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive. Family sci-fi adventure, starring Josh Hutcherson, Jonah Bobo, Kristen Stewart, Tim Robbins and Dax Shepard.(n)

Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt.(n)

programme.title: Black or White
programme.desc: A man who has been left to care for his mixed race granddaughter suffers a further tragedy when his wife dies, plunging him into depression and alcoholism. He is approached by the mother of the child's father, who suggests she would be better off living with her family, sparking off a bitter, racially charged custody battle. Drama, starring Kevin Costner, Octavia Spencer and Anthony Mackie.(n)

programme.title: Single White Female
programme.desc: Software designer Allison is looking for a flatmate and seems to have struck lucky with shy applicant Hedra. However, Allison soon comes to realise her new friend is dangerously obsessed with her, and when she plans a reconciliation with her former boyfriend, a jealous Hedra becomes increasingly unhinged. Psychological thriller, with Bridget Fonda, Jennifer Jason Leigh, and Steven Weber.(n)

programme.desc: A couple buy their dream house and rent out a flat to a well-off bachelor who turns out to be the tenant from hell. Psychological thriller, starring Michael Keaton, Melanie Griffith, Matthew Modine and Tippi Hedren.(n)

programme.title: The Water Horse: Legend of the Deep
programme.desc: A lonely boy living in the Scottish Highlands during the Second World War stumbles on a curiously large egg by the water's edge of the local loch. Astonishingly, it hatches into a cute baby sea monster and, although he tries his hardest to keep it concealed, the task is made almost impossible by the creature's alarming rate of growth. Children's fantasy adventure, based on the book by Dick King-Smith, with Alex Etel, Emily Watson and David Morrissey.(n)

programme.title: Home Run
programme.desc: A professional baseball player with a substance abuse problem is forced into rehab in his hometown, finding new hope when he gets honest about his chequered past and starts to coach a Little League team. Drama, starring Scott Elrod, Dorian Brown Pham, Charles Henry Wyson and James Devoti.(n)

programme.title: Look Who's Talking Too
programme.desc: Wisecracking toddler Mikey is joined by mischievous baby sister Julie and sibling rivalry inevitably erupts - while their parents have problems of their own to deal with, in the shape of the kids' good-for-nothing uncle. Comedy sequel, starring John Travolta and Kirstie Alley, with the voices of Bruce Willis and Rosanne Barr.(n)

programme.title: The Remains of the Day
programme.desc: A butler in a 1930s aristocratic household has dedicated himself to serving his master, putting duty above all else and repressing his affection for the housekeeper, who also happens to be in love with him. On the outbreak of war, the nobleman's Nazi sympathies come to light, marking a change of heart in the old servant, who looks back with misgivings about the loyalty that may have cost him dearly. Period drama, with Anthony Hopkins, Emma Thompson and James Fox.(n)

programme.title: The Machine
programme.desc: A scientist working on a project to create robotic soldiers for the military creates an artificially intelligent android, but his employers fear its independence and order him to destroy it. However, the machine has developed its own objectives and will fight to achieve them. Sci-fi thriller, starring Caity Lotz, Toby Stephens and Denis Lawson.(n)

programme.title: Drive Hard
programme.desc: A bank robber finds himself in need of a getaway driver for his latest heist. When he comes across a former racing champion working as a driving instructor, he books a lesson on the day of the robbery, then forces the hapless teacher to help him escape the police. Action thriller, starring John Cusack and Thomas Jane.(n)

programme.title: The Watcher
programme.desc: A detective tracking a serial killer gives up all hope of solving the crimes and moves to another city. After he's settled in, the old acquaintance makes himself known. The serial killer has resurrected and begins sending him new pictures of new victims(n)

programme.title: Secret Window
programme.desc: Johnny Depp gives a virtuoso performance in this terrifying psycho-thriller based on the novella by Stephen King. Depp plays an author suffering from writer's block who becomes totally unhinged after he is accused of plagiarism by a menacing stranger (John Turturro)(n)

programme.title: Speed 2: Cruise Control
programme.desc: After finding herself stuck on an out-of-control bus in the first movie, Sandra Bullock's feisty heroine Annie returns for a new adventure. Annie thinks her new boyfriend, Alex (Jason Patric), is a policeman and she wants him to stop putting his life in danger. What Alex hasn't told her is that he's actually a SWAT team member, which means he's engaged in some of the most dangerous activities imaginable! When Annie finds out the truth, Alex decides to apologise by taking her on a romantic cruise. But fate conspires to ruin their holiday when disgruntled ex-employee Geiger (Willem Dafoe) decides to forego an industrial tribunal in favour of blowing up the boat owned by the company which fired him! As the now out-of-control cruise ship hurtles towards potential destruction and Annie gets herself into a series of risky scrapes, Alex dangles, dives, swings and leaps his way around the ship, rescuing passengers in distress and desperately searching for a way to prevent his romantic cruise from having an explosive ending(n)

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: Hotshot bomber pilot Vic Deakins goes AWOL with two US Air Force nuclear missiles. His co-pilot Riley Hale must find the bombs before Deakins can put his blackmail plan into effect. Pacy action thriller(n)

programme.desc: The life and career of comedian Robert Klein are the focus of this documentary, which includes interviews with Jerry Seinfeld, Jon Stewart, Richard Lewis and more(n)

programme.desc: XXXI. Max has a run-in with the law; Rogers reckons with the past; Flint and Madi come to an understanding; and Long John Silver returns(n)

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: XXXII. Violence runs amok in Nassau; Silver demands answers from Billy; Eleanor aids Max; and Bonny and Rackham endure a hellish existence(n)

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: XXXIII. The Royal Navy retreats to England and the West Indies turn into a war zone, while the shores of New Providence Island run red with blood(n)

programme.title: Black Sails
programme.desc: XXXIV. Nassau is delivered; Silver makes amends, but it's a painful one; Madi and Flint are separated; and Rogers searches for Eleanor(n)

programme.desc: A TV stock-market guru, Lee Gates and his producer are held hostage during a live broadcast by a man who lost his life's savings due to a bad tip. Gates is forced to raise the stock up by 24.5 points before the bell rings, or be killed on live TV in front of millions watching(n)

programme.desc: Molly Shannon recreates her Saturday Night Live persona as a Catholic schoolgirl who dreams of becoming a Hollywood star and marrying the best-looking boy in school(n)

programme.desc: A man deeply in debt hires two inept crooks to kidnap his wife and split the ransom money. The deal goes bad when the crooks kill a highway patrolman and 2 hapless bystanders, and the murders fall under the jurisdiction of a pregnant but persistent Minnesota police chief(n)

programme.desc: XXXVII. Silver and his men track Flint on Skeleton Island; Madi receives an offer; Rogers struggles to hear Eleanor; Billy casts his lot(n)

programme.desc: Come Home. In the Season 2 premiere, an investigation is touched off after a young British woman collapses in the street of a German town and is found to be the same one who had been abducted from the same town 11 years ago(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: The Turtle and the Stick. Alice's return to home leaves the Websters struggling to deal with the trauma she has suffered. Meanwhile, Matthew ponders an unbearable request; Gemma's suspicions about what happened to her daughter begin to grow; the Royal Military Police and the German police agree to share jurisdiction of the case and launch a search for the second missing girl(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: A Prison Without Walls. Julien returns to Paris to visit the father of Sophie Giroux, but Remy isn't all that pleased to see him. Meanwhile, Alice is upset by an argument in the house and begs her brother, Matthew, to act against his better judgment in order to help her feel safe. When another unforeseeable trauma hits the Webster family, it looks set to tear them apart for good(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: Statice. Julien continues to hunt for Sophie as the Webster family implodes. Meanwhile, breaks in the case during 2014 and 2016 lead to two key suspects(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: Das Vergessen. Julien and Jorn's investigation leads them further into the murky underbelly of Eckhausen and the secrets of its conflicting German and British communities. However, as he gets closer to the truth, Julien is dramatically let down by his own body. The Webster family drift further and further apart as Matthew gets involved with violent thugs and Sam seeks solace elsewhere(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: Saint John. It is now 2015 and Julien's health is failing, but his determination to track down the missing girl means he has not finished with the Webster case just yet. Back in Germany, the press descend on Eckhausen for a trial when a seemingly vital piece of new evidence comes to light. Gemma is surprised by a phone call from Julien and finds a new purpose that helps break through her stupor(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: 1991. Secrets from the past are uncovered as Julien finally learns the truth behind Alice and Sophie's abduction. But time is running out, and nobody in Eckhausen will listen to him. Has Julien cracked the case, or is he simply deluded? With nowhere left to turn, how far will Julien go in his search to find the truth?(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: The Mountain. The truth of the events leading up to Alice's return to Eckhausen in 2014 is finally revealed. Meanwhile, in 2016, Sam and Gemma are pulling together and join Julien in a desperate race against time, as they track Alice and Sophie's abductor from Germany all the way to the mountains of Switzerland(n)

programme.title: Stargate
programme.desc: Egyptologist James Spader and gung-ho soldier Kurt Russell lead an expedition through the newly discovered and interpreted Stargate which leads to a distant planet ruled by the god Ra (Jaye Davidson). He created humanity but was locked off from dominating Earth by the absence of the Stargate. Now that the Stargate is open again, he's ready to return unless he can be stopped..(n)

programme.title: Northmen - A Viking Saga
programme.desc: After being banished from their homeland, a group of ruthless vikings are shipwrecked behind enemy lines. As a mercenary army bears down on them, it is a race against time to escape or be hunted down(n)

programme.title: The Lookout
programme.desc: Writer-director Scott Frank, who scripted the screen adaptations of Elmore Leonard's "Get Shorty" and "Out of Sight," scores a winner with this gripping noirish caper saga. Joseph Gordon-Levitt stars as a bank janitor who falls in with thieves who are planning to rob his workplace. When he has second thoughts about participating, they ratchet up the pressure with threats to some innocent outsiders. Jeff Daniels, Matthew Goode, Isla Fisher, Carla Gugino, Bruce McGill, Sergio Di Zio(n)

programme.title: The Messengers
programme.desc: An ominous darkness invades a seemingly serene sunflower farm in North Dakota, and the Solomon family is torn apart by suspicion, mayhem and murder(n)

programme.desc: In the UN building in New York, interpreter Silvia claims that African dictator Zuwanie is about to be assassinated. Zuwanie's FBI minder Keller doesn't believe Silvia, until the conspirators try to kill her(n)

programme.title: Blow
programme.desc: George Jung was the Boston kid who became America's biggest cocaine supplier, in league with Colombian Pablo Escobar. Director Ted Demme's final feature is a rags-to-riches morality tale of power and pitfalls(n)

programme.title: The Interpreter
programme.desc: In the UN building in New York, interpreter Silvia claims that African dictator Zuwanie is about to be assassinated. Zuwanie's FBI minder Keller doesn't believe Silvia, until the conspirators try to kill her(n)

Has Julien cracked the case, or is he simply deluded? With nowhere left to turn, how far will Julien go in his search to find the truth?(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: Ace Israeli commando Zohan Dvir fakes his own death so he can realise his dreams of becoming a New York hairdresser, but his past soon catches up with him(n)

programme.title: The Hot Chick
programme.desc: Rob Schneider and Anna Faris star in this body-swap comedy. A cheerleader learns a humiliating lesson when some magical earrings make her switch bodies with a male crook(n)

programme.title: PCU
programme.desc: Actor Hart Bochner turns director in the satirical Animal House update P.C.U.. Per the title, the film takes place on the campus of a University where, thanks to militant dean Jessica Walter, Political Correctness has reached ridiculous proportions. A group of dorm-room cutups, wallowing in their uncorrectness, declares war on the uptight student activists who call the shots. Saturday Night Live's David Spade is among the leading players; while he's funnier here than in his costarring stints in Chris Farley's films, he doesn't have much to work with. The subject matter covered in P.C.U. has already been tackled, with far funnier results, on Bill Maher's cable-TV weekly Politically Incorrect(n)

programme.title: Catch .44
programme.desc: Three ruthless female outlaws scheme to intercept a lucrative drug shipment for a notorious crime boss, and get drawn into a dangerous series of double crosses. Tes (Malin Akerman), Kara (Nikki Reed) and Tara (Deborah Ann Woll) are the kind of criminals who always get the job done. But when their boss Mel (Bruce Willis) dispatches them on a dangerous mission, a quiet diner becomes the scene of a tense confrontation. Shea Whigham and Brad Dourif co-star(n)

programme.title: Father of Invention
programme.desc: An entrepreneur with a world-class ego has to rebuild his empire and his family relationships from scratch in this comedy. Robert Axle (Kevin Spacey) built a multi-million-dollar business out of selling household gadgets through television infomercials, and managed to alienate nearly everyone around him when fame and wealth turned him into an arrogant loudmouth. When one of Axle's products turns out to be dangerous and causes several thousand customers to lose a finger, he loses his fortune and spends eight years in prison for gross negligence. Back on the street, Axle is broke but determined to find a way back to the top, though he's just a bit more humble than he used to be and wants to win back the love of his daughter, Claire (Camilla Belle), whom he neglected as a child, and his ex-wife (Virginia Madsen). Things go badly for Axle on his first day working at a big-box discount store, and he's left with little alternative than to ask Claire to let him stay with her; she and her roommate, Fibbi (Heather Graham), aren't so sure this is a good idea, but they grudgingly agree and end up helping Axle in his bid to redeem himself. Father of Invention also stars Johnny Knoxville, Craig Robinson, and Michael Rosenbaum(n)

programme.title: The Interpreter

programme.title: Summer Rental
programme.desc: After air traffic controller Jack Chester loses a plane, he's told to take a break. Booking his family into a plush resort, however, his much-needed vacation soon turns into a total disaster(n)

programme.title: The Rewrite
programme.desc: A has-been screenwriter reluctantly takes a teaching job at a university in New York. He soon becomes emotionally invested in the lives of his students, particularly a single mother who recently caught the writing bug(n)

programme.title: You Don't Mess With the Zohan
programme.desc: Ace Israeli commando Zohan Dvir fakes his own death so he can realise his dreams of becoming a New York hairdresser, but his past soon catches up with him(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: Set just three decades in the future, Alex Proyas's all-action science fiction film is inspired by Isaac Asimov's 1950s short story. The science of robotics is so advanced that humanoid-looking servants have been developed, ready to obey any command from a human. When the chief designer of US Robotics, the biggest manufacturer of this new brand, is found dead in the company's atrium after a fall from the upper floor, it has all the hallmarks of suicide, and Chicago cop Del Spooner is assigned to the case. But, because of a previous trauma, Spooner is a technophobe and doesn't believe that all robots are harmless. Despite opposition from both his superiors and the company, he investigates further and soon his suspicions centre on one robot, Sonny (voiced by Alan Tudyk). Is "he" one of an army of conscious, violent robots ready to challenge their human masters?(n)

programme.title: The Hot Chick
programme.desc: Rob Schneider and Anna Faris star in this body-swap comedy. A cheerleader learns a humiliating lesson when some magical earrings make her switch bodies with a male crook(n)

programme.title: Honey
programme.desc: A dancer tries to balance her dreams of stardom with her devotion to her old neighborhood. Rappers Missy Elliott, Ginuwine and Jadakiss have cameos(n)

programme.title: The Missing
programme.desc: 1991. Secrets from the past are uncovered as Julien finally learns the truth behind Alice and Sophie's abduction. But time is running out, and nobody in Eckhausen will listen to him. Has Julien cracked the case, or is he simply deluded? With nowhere left to turn, how far will Julien go in his search to find the truth?(n)

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: While treasure hunting in the Bahamas, a group of young divers discover a wrecked cargo plane on the ocean's floor. Within lies millions of dollars of illegal drugs, and the divers' dream of finding sunken treasure has come true. But as they argue among themselves about what to do with their prize, the friends soon realize they're not the only ones interested in the narcotics. Dangerous criminals are also searching for the drugs, and now the treasure hunters themselves have become the hunted(n)

programme.title: Grindhouse
programme.desc: In a throwback to 1970s exploitation films and drive-in double features, directors Quentin Tarantino and Robert Rodriguez serve up a chilling two-fer with "Death Proof" and "Planet Terror." The first is about a killer car; the second's a zombie flick. In the opener, Kurt Russell plays a stuntman wreaking havoc with his wheels of death. Then, survivors of a bio-weapon mishap battle an army of killer zombies. Rose McGowan has roles in both. Tarantino and Rodriguez also scripted their films(n)

programme.title: Smashed
programme.desc: In this riveting drama, an alcoholic couple are torn apart when the wife decides to get sober in order to keep her job as an elementary-school teacher and repair her relationship with her mother(n)

programme.title: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the acclaimed graphic novel, a precocious teenage girl living in 1970s San Francisco tries to understand the connection between sex and love after she seduces her bohemian mother's boyfriend(n)

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. What begins as a clash of wills evolves into something more profound, as the journalist's presence helps her make peace with her husband's passing(n)

programme.title: Aloft
programme.desc: A mother reunites with her estranged son, whom she abandoned two decades earlier after a strange encounter with a faith healer(n)

programme.title: Annie Hall
programme.desc: Rogue lobsters, spiders "as big as a Buick" and a romance that blossoms in the Manhattan spring. With its irresistible brand of bittersweet comedy, the story of stand-up comic Alvy Singer and his nervy wooing of free-spirited Annie Hall won Best Picture in 1977(n)

programme.title: Thank You for Smoking
programme.desc: Aaron Eckhart lights up the screen in this hilarious satire about a gleefully amoral tobacco industry lobbyist who stops at nothing to put a positive spin on smoking as he clashes with a senator (William H. Macy), who wants to snuff out cigarettes. Maria Bello, Adam Brody, Sam Elliott, Katie Holmes, Rob Lowe. Directed by Jason Reitman(n)

programme.title: Tumbledown
programme.desc: The grieving widow of a singer-songwriter clashes with an acerbic journalist who arrives in her small Maine town announcing he's writing a biography about her late husband and his mysterious death. programme.title: In Bruges
programme.desc: Irish playwright Martin McDonagh brings crackling dialogue and pitch-black humour to this tale about hit men laying low after a botched job. Exiled to picturesque Bruges, Belgium, partners Ken and Ray kill time in pubs, museums and medieval churches while awaiting word from their sociopathic boss. The fun is over when he calls with a troubling new assignment(n)

programme.title: The Diary of a Teenage Girl
programme.desc: In this adaptation of the acclaimed graphic novel, a precocious teenage girl living in 1970s San Francisco tries to understand the connection between sex and love after she seduces her bohemian mother's boyfriend(n)

programme.title: Kill the Irishman
programme.desc: This incredible biopic follows Cleveland union rep Danny Greene (Ray Stevenson), who earned notoriety in the mid-'70s for his willingness to defy the Italian mob. A former Mafia enforcer, Greene managed to survive numerous assassination attempts, and eventually he dealt a devastating blow to organized-crime syndicates across the U.S(n)

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: When an aspiring singer is sent to prison for shooting her lying lover, she meets a tabloid darling and headline singer who is in for a double murder. With the help of a slick Chicago lawyer, she learns to play the media game and vies for the valuable press attention that will get her out of jail(n)

programme.title: In Bruges

programme.title: The Man Who Wasn't There
programme.desc: Billy Bob Thornton is a barber in a sleepy '40s town whose wife (Frances McDormand) is having an affair with her boss James Gandolfini. But when he's offered a get-rich-quick scheme, his plans to raise the money lead to blackmail, murder, death-row for his wife, an expensive city lawyer (Tony Shalhoub) and then, by a savage irony, his own appointment with the electric chair for a crime he didn't commit. The Coen Brothers' Oscar-nominated Hitchcockian tribute to the film noir genre is sparked with humour, darkness and outstanding performances(n)

programme.title: Stone
programme.desc: A convicted arsonist schemes to get out of prison by convincing his debauched wife to seduce his retirement-ready parole officer in director John J. Curran's adaptation of a play by Angus MacLachlan (who also authored the screenplay). His career as a parole officer winding down after years of service, Jack Mabry (Robert De Niro) reluctantly accepts an assignment to reassess inmate Gerald "Stone" Creeson's (Edward Norton) case for an upcoming parole hearing. Convicted of setting a fire to make the murder of his grandparents look like an accidental death, Stone will do anything to get out from behind bars, and his wife, Lucetta (Milla Jovovich), is willing to do whatever it takes to help secure her husband's freedom -- including seducing Jack. Meanwhile, Jack's devoted wife, Madylyn (Frances Conroy), has suffered with the emotional weight of her husband's demanding job for far too long(n)

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: An cranky septuagenarian poet is drawn back into the lives of her workaholic daughter and teenage granddaughter when the latter asks for her help in dealing with an unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.title: Cherish
programme.desc: Zoe is almost 30 years and longs for love. She listens to the romantic radio station Cherish and dream about meeting the right one. After too many Martinis at the local pub, she gets involved in an absurd kidnapping resulting in the death of a policeman. Zoe is wrongly accused for the death. Zoe is forced into house arrest with electronic tagging, but keep up hope that her life will end up back on track(n)

programme.title: Somewhere
programme.desc: A bored movie star puts a temporary halt to his life of endless hedonism in order to spend time with his 11-year-old daughter when her mother leaves her in his care. As the two reconnect, he is forced to reassess his sordid lifestyle(n)

programme.title: Big Fish
programme.desc: Teller of tall tales Edward is dying, so his estranged son Will comes home to make peace. As, yet again, Edward relates fanciful stories of his youth, Will starts to think that there could be some truth in them(n)

programme.title: Saint Laurent
programme.desc: This biopic of visionary French clothing designer Yves Saint Laurent focuses on his cutting-edge work during the 1960s and '70s(n)

programme.title: Being John Malkovich
programme.desc: Wildly inventive dark comedy about a puppeteer who gains access to John Malkovich's brain via a small portal in his office. Later, a love triangle forms when he and his wife both have affairs with one of his coworkers while inhabiting Malkovich's body(n)

programme.title: The Family Fang
programme.desc: In this charmingly off-kilter family drama, siblings reunite at their childhood home after their parents, avant-garde artists who specialize in public comedy skits, go missing. They soon wonder if their parents are truly in trouble, or if their disappearance is their final stunt(n)

programme.desc: Three sisters take their younger half sister under their wing after their estranged father passes away(n)

programme.desc: (1992); Director Abel Ferrara's controversial crime drama. 'The Lieutenant' (Harvey Keitel) is addicted to drugs, alcohol and gambling, and is up to his neck in debt. He's also one of New York's finest, and when a nun is brutally raped, his desire to find the rapist is only increased by the $50,000 reward on offer. M,W,R,S(n)

programme.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
programme.desc: Johnny Depp stars as a writer on assignment who goes on a drug-fueled binge in Las Vegas with his lawyer, Dr Gonzo. Adapted from Hunter S. Thompson's 1971 novel(n)

programme.desc: A charming-as-ever Diane Keaton stars as a desperate housewife who gets a job as a janitor at the Kansas City Federal Reserve Bank, where she and two other low-level employees (Queen Latifah, Katie Holmes) devise a plan to steal a fortune in old bills already marked for shredding. Oscar-winning screenwriter Callie Khouri ("Thelma & Louise") directed. Diane Keaton, Queen Latifah, Katie Holmes(n)

programme.desc: Artifact hunter and archaeologist extraordinaire Ben Franklin Gates learns of his own family's implication in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln by John Wilkes Booth. Gates must then locate an elusive diary, not only to clear his family's name, but to unearth and connect several secrets, buried within the book, that point to a massive, global conspiracy(n)

programme.desc: Newly fired sports agent Jerry Maguire carves out his own career, signing a star pro-football player and falling for new employee Dorothy Boyd. Comedy drama(n)

programme.desc: "Don't underestimate casual sex, Janey, it's very liberating." Dumped by slimeball Ray, TV researcher Jane is forced to flatshare with womanising Eddie. It's not ideal, but sometimes Mr Right turns up in the least expected place(n)

programme.desc: A punk-loving teen moves to New York City in the late '80s with his bohemian dad, and gets caught up in the local music scene in this exhilarating coming-of-age story. He also befriends a girl his age who's coping with an unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.title: Driving Lessons
programme.desc: Harry Potter's best mate Ron Weasley, a.k.a. Rupert Grint, takes the lead in this well-handled coming-of-age saga. Grint works his magic as the repressed son of a henpecked vicar and his willful wife who takes a summer job with a daft old actress (Julie Walters) and gets a lesson in how to fully enjoy life. Laura Linney costars as the lad's mother. Written and directed by Jeremy Brock, who, as a youth, once worked for British acting titan Peggy Ashcroft(n)

programme.desc: Richard Pearce's comedy-drama stars Steve Martin as Jonas Nightengale, a con artist whose latest scheme has him posing as a traveling evangelist. programme.title: Fired Up!
programme.desc: This peppy and uproarious teen romp is boosted by excellent performances from Nicholas D'Agosto and Eric Christian Olsen as Illinois high-school football stars who bag summer camp in red-hot Texas to try their luck at cheerleading camp instead. With 300 young ladies to hit on, it becomes more of a booty camp than boot camp for the two young lotharios. But before they know it, both get more involved, romantically and athletically, than they expected. Molly Sims. Directed by Will Gluck(n)

programme.title: Monsters, Inc.
programme.desc: Sulley the ogre and Mike, his lime green, one-eyed friend, work for Monsters Inc - a scream-processing factory that converts children's fear into energy. When a little girl inadvertently follows them back to their world, the monstrous pair must overcome their own fear of humans to get her back home(n)

programme.desc: Aliens ask the unemployed actors of a cancelled science-fiction series to help them win an intergalactic war in this comedy(n)

programme.title: Four Weddings and a Funeral
programme.desc: A reserved Englishman meets attractive American Carrie at a wedding and falls in love with her, but his inability to express his feelings seems to forestall any possibility of relationship - until they meet again and again(n)

programme.title: Chasing Amy
programme.desc: Ben Affleck and Jason Lee are starting to make it as a comic strip creators but their friendship is threatened when Affleck falls head-over-heels for Joey Lauren Adams. Who is gay. Kevin Smith offers an engaging, amusing love story that carries an underlying seriousness about the pains of love(n)

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: Compelling Civil War drama based on a true story. A regiment of black soldiers, led by a rookie white officer, fight both the Confederacy and racism within their own ranks(n)

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: In the frightmarish tradition of "The Blair Witch Project" comes this nerve-jangling chiller. Jennifer Carpenter is outstanding as a TV reporter who gets confined to a quarantined apartment complex in Los Angeles that houses a mysterious, scary secret. It isn't long before she learns why someone was "screaming bloody murder." A remake of the 2007 Spanish horror film "REC." Directed by John Erick Dowdle, who cowrote the script with Drew Dowdle. Steve Harris, Jay Hernandez, Johnathon Schaech(n)

programme.title: The Bleeding
programme.desc: Left for dead by a gang of ruthless vampires who forced him to witness the slaughter of his own family, ex-Army Ranger Shawn Black (Michael Matthias) vows to put every last one of the vicious bloodsuckers back in the ground where they belong. Later, as Shawn tracks down the hive's magnetic leader Cain (Vinnie Jones) and his loyal servant Vanya (Kat Von D), he realizes this is one job he can't handle on his own. Fortunately for Shawn, Reverend Ray (Michael Madsen) is there to help him realize his true potential as a "slayer", one of the few remaining humans with the power to defeat the living dead. DMX and Armand Assante co-star(n)

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: Thriller about a killer stalking a group of FBI profilers who've gathered for a weekend of training(n)

programme.title: Redbelt
programme.desc: Tim Allen and Chiwetel Ejiofor co-star in writer/director David Mamet's martial arts drama Redbelt. Ejiofor plays Mike Terry, a jujitsu master who co-runs a very modest martial arts studio in Los Angeles with his bossy wife, Sondra (Alice Braga). Mike demonstrates an unwavering commitment to his craft and draws a cadre of defiantly loyal pupils including Joe (Max Martini), an LAPD cop. All told, it appears that he has chosen a peaceful and conflict-free path in life. The dedicated martial artist's fate takes an unanticipated turn, however, one evening when a young woman named Laura (Emily Mortimer) bursts into the academy in a state of near hysteria, and reaches for a policeman's gun when he tries to restrain her. One thing leads to another, and before long, Laura is regularly receiving martial arts lessons from Mike. As master begins to teach pupil and his martial arts philosophies emerge, his path also crisscrosses with that of a Hollywood movie star, Chet Frank (Tim Allen), when he saves the fellow from a beating at a local club and gets invited (along with Sondra) to Chet's house for dinner. Chet extends gestures of friendship, and Mike's guard breaks down; he speaks openly and candidly of a special martial arts method he employs that requires one of the participants to "assume a handicap." In time, the association with Chet leads to involvement in the motion-picture industry, and relations with a bevy of characters who aren't exactly what they seem -- including a pay-per-view fight mogul (Ricky Jay) and Chet's slimy and manipulative manager (Joe Mantegna)(n)

programme.title: Glory
programme.desc: Compelling Civil War drama based on a true story. A regiment of black soldiers, led by a rookie white officer, fight both the Confederacy and racism within their own ranks(n)

programme.desc: In this suspenseful thriller a successful lobbyist jumps into a new relationship shortly after breaking up with her noncommittal boyfriend. But when her ex resurfaces she soon realizes that one of the two men is not who he appears to be(n)

programme.desc: The civilian crew of a drilling station are called in to save sailors in a nuclear submarine stuck on the seabed of the Atlantic. But they aren't the only ones interested in the lost sub. Deep sea chiller(n)

The situation becomes even more complicated when each of the officer's personalities begins to fall for the young woman. Chris Cooper, Anthony Anderson, Mongo Brownlee, Jerod Mixon(n)

programme.title: Rhyme & Reason
programme.desc: Rhyme and Reason features some of the biggest stars in rap music discussing the history and impact of hip hop and rap music. Director Peter Spirer takes a sociological approach to this primarily African American art form, focusing more on interviews and historical facts than on presenting examples of the diverse musical genre itself. Those offering insights include Ice-T, Chuck-D, KRS-ONE, Notorious B.I.G., and Wu Tang Clan. Female rappers Salt and Pepa, Da Brat and the Fugees' Lauren Hill offer their thoughts on rap music and misogyny. Also examined is the controversy over the violent lyrics found in gangsta rap. In the film's latter stages, the filmmakers attend rapper Tupac Shakur's funeral(n)

programme.desc: An American police chief in Puerto Rico interrogates an influential lawyer about the death of two young girls(n)

During one of his rare stints out of incarceration, career criminal John Lyshitski learns of the conviction. John holds a grudge against Nelson's father and decides to get his revenge by going back to jail and making Nelson's stay there as horrible as possible(n)

They should have been retired by now, but feel like they can do more for the PD.
